Articles.Content:
It takes many years, but it \*might\* be possible. I want you to exit the solar system. See what happens. Go where you might not even be able to go. Do it. Now. Take pictures of your trip, from launch to the end, & at least 1 map view.

If you do, YAY!

- - - Updated - - -

Mods are acceptable, as long as no other solar systems involved.

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/JansluO.png](http://i.imgur.com/JansluO.png)
> This count? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Which Kraken did you encounter?

You know a whil3 ago i did the math and if you were to do this legit and use thev east Delta V, at full timewarp it would take roughly 8.8 earth years to reach the edge, assuming you never turned off your pc.

> 
> Which Kraken did you encounter?

Self-Induced 10,000Kn thrust ship-eating Kraken. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
